file_content.text: I don't like this. Whole thing smells funny.
You worry too much.
It's going to be okay.
I know better than to try and stop you, but come back in one piece. Okay?
You have my word.
I want more than that.
Gault's cologne is oppressive.
Smells like a Devaronian.
No one believes me when I talk about your sense of humor.
Sith humor is an acquired taste.
One I don't want to live without.
It will be over soon. Then we can start making up for the past five years.
This is the final battle.
Or I'll lose you. Again.
You're not going to lose me, Vette.
Ib'tuur jatne tuur ash'ad kyr'amur.
My Mando'a is a little rusty.
Say that again?
It means, "Today is a good day for someone else to die."
That goes for you as well.
Don't worry about me. Waited for you too long to die now.
"Today is a good day for someone else to die."
Well put.
You remember our lessons.
Don't look so surprised. You were a good teacher.
Fight hard and come back to me.
Arcann's been good prey, but it's time for the hunt to end.
I'm ready to finish this.
Until the next big game comes along.
I think we've earned a little break--at least a hunting trip of our own.
I like the sound of that.
Sorry to interrupt, but the Gravestone's ready.
I had hoped we'd get to decide when and where to fight Arcann, but you're ready for this.
Asylum feels like millennia ago.
Been a long time coming.
I'm not the same person Arcann fought on Asylum.
I'm done hiding.
Every second we stand here gives Arcann more time to prepare.
No time to chat.
Wish me luck.
[Flirt] I'm ready for a kiss.
Luck has nothing to do with it. Arcann may have bested you on Asylum, but Valkorion's training changed you.
You're powerful. More powerful than--
Lana. You're missing the point.
I'm what?
Oh. I see.
When you're done blushing, we've got an Emperor to kill.
Don't look so pleased with yourself.
After your stint in carbonite, time must be difficult to process.
Yes, he's in for a surprise.
The Gravestone is ready to depart. Let's end this.
Someone doesn't like surprises.
Begin the assault.
Don't sulk. We'll get your throne back. And teach SCORPIO some manners.
The machine is a distraction. I'll deal with it when the Outlander is dead.
You want to see Father that badly? Think Mother will come, too?
I'm counting on it.
I'm holding you to that.
Sorry to interrupt, but the Gravestone's ready.
